messages.message: You are now connected on Messenger.

Hi Brian, hope you are well. After your question to me about how I keep up to date, I did some searching....  I though you might like this site, it has a lot of info about what is new and trendy http://www.makeuseof.com/service/programming/
Programming - MakeUseOf
Whether you’re an expert programmer or new to coding, this is where you’ll find everything from introductory guides to Python and SQL, to expert CSS or VB.Net code examples.
makeuseof.com
Please send my regards to Iga. Ciao

Brian
Cool find, thank you for sharing!

Hi Brian, hope you are well and all your computers are running smoothly  I have a question....you mentioned during our short cookout that your company might be willing to provide me with sponsorship in order for me to get my work visa? I am not sure as to how serious your were, but if at all possible, I would really appreciate your help.  Thanks K
Thank you, have a good weekend !
